entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Charlo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 10:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: WNW 36 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
